frameset.edef: to run or fall short, to run out

example.parse: (VP (IV2MS+IV تِخَلِّي) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG خِيارَة)) (PP-LOC (PREP فِي) (NP (NOUN جِيب) (NP (NOUN_QUANT كُلّ) (NP (NOUN مُواطِن))))))))) (NP-SBJ (ADJ لازِم)) (SBAR-PRD (-NONE- 0) (S (S (NP-TPC-1 (DET+NOUN الخِيار)) (VP (IV3MS+IV يشح) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1))))
